body:
### I'm Mike
I'm currently employed full time by The Ohio State University Department of Integrated Systems Engineering.    My job functions are spread all over the place, but my primary role is Systems Developer/Engineer.  I also manage the IT group for my department.

### I'm a part time freelance application developer
In my spare time, I develop applications for a variety of local and remote clients.  I have experience developing web applications using [Python (Django)](https://www.djangoproject.com/) and [C# ASP.NET MVC](http://www.asp.net/mvc).  I have developed Enterprise Java applications using [JavaEE](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javaee/overview/index.html).  I have experience developing mobile iOS Applications using Objective-C, as well as cross-platform games using the [Unity Game Engine](http://unity3d.com/).

### I manage systems
I have CompTIA A+ and Network+ certifications, as well as ITIL v3 Foundations training.  I have experience managing servers running the following operating systems:  Windows Server 2000, Windows Server 2003, Windows Server 2008, Windows Server 2008R2, Mac OS 10.6 Server, Mac OS 10.7 Server, Mac OS X Server, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, Linux (various distributions), HP-UX, VMware vSphere 4.0, and VMware vSphere 5.0 (to name a few).  I also manage several hundred PCs running Windows 7 using [Microsoft System Center](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/server-cloud/system-center/default.aspx).

### Résumé
I have a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & Engineering from The Department of Computer Science & Engineering at The Ohio State University.  I also have 10 years of full time IT employment.  My full résumé is available upon request.

### Hire me!
Do you need something developed?  Do you need help managing systems?  Have the next great idea?  I would love to be a part of it.  E-mail me at mzazon@gmail.com and we can talk about it.

### Portfolio
Check out my GitHub, but most of my projects are hosted elsewhere.  You can contact me for my other work.

### Licenses
Everything I have on GitHub is licensed under the [Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/), unless otherwise noted.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with something I developed?  Need to contact me?  E-mail me at mzazon@gmail.com and we’ll chat.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Mike Zazon
